snippet: The appointment of Richard Cordray as director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau finally gives the agency the legal standing to supervise payday lenders, money transfer agencies, credit bureaus and debt collectors.
abstract: Pres Obama's appointment of Richard Cordray as director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau finally gives the agency the legal standing to supervise payday lenders, money transfer agencies, credit bureaus and debt collectors.
lead_paragraph: The appointment of Richard Cordray as director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau finally gives the agency the legal standing to supervise payday lenders, money transfer agencies, credit bureaus and debt collectors.
